name: get_stock_data
description: Fetches stock data for a given symbol from Alpha Vantage API, with options for different time units and intervals.

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., 'AAPL' for Apple, 'GOOG' for Google).

time_unit.description: The time unit for the stock data. Options include 'day', 'week', 'month', or 'intraday'.

limit.description: The number of data points to return.

interval.description: Only applicable when 'time_unit' is 'intraday'. The interval between two consecutive data points. Options include '1min', '5min', '15min', '30min', '60min'.
